events.message: I received my order yesterday, but when I opened the package I noticed the product was broken and has multiple scratches all over the surface.
Based on the description provided, this case is categorized under Product Defect for further assistance and resolution.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product support agents who will assist you with the issue regarding your damaged item.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear that your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and broken parts? This will help us verify the damage and expedite the replacement process.
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and broken edges on the product. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement unit immediately and arrange for the defective item to be picked up from your address at no cost.
I appreciate the prompt response and the offer to replace the product quickly. Looking forward to receiving the new one soon.
We have processed your replacement order, and it will be shipped within the next 24 hours. A courier will contact you to schedule the pickup.
We just wanted to check if you have received the replacement product and if everything is in perfect condition now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help and quick service!
We are glad to hear that your issue is resolved. We will now close this support case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
